mapper.select: SELECT nstat_id as id, IP, session, browser, version, count, system, ref_id as refererId, device, tstamp as created FROM nstatistics WHERE IP = #{IP} AND ( DATE_FORMAT( tstamp, '%m-%d-%Y %H:%i:%s') = DATE_FORMAT( CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '%m-%d-%Y %H:%i:%s') )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nstatistics (nstat_id, IP, session, browser, version, count, system, ref_id, device, tstamp) VALUES (#{id}, #{IP}, #{session}, #{browser}, #{version}, #{count}, #{system}, #{refererId}, #{device}, #{created})
